General.Name: Dragonfly GF Co. Ltd
General.Description: Dragonfly GF Co., Ltd. engages in the game development activities in South Korea. The company develops VR, mobile, online, and PC games. It operates in Thailand, China, the United States, and Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: 80, Seocho Central Road 22-gil, Seoul, South Korea, 06632
